RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES! Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history! Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and youâ€™re out of officeâ€”maintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city. KEY FEATURES â€¢ 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choicesâ€”every decision is yours! â€¢ Swipe & Decide â€“ Instant control, deep consequence. â€¢ Triple Balance System â€“ People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green. â€¢ Chain Cards â€“ Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future. â€¢ Adventure Cards â€“ Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends. â€¢ Character Stories â€“ Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thiefâ€¦ each NPC steers you to a different ending. â€¢ Endless Replayability â€“ Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new. LAUNCH DISCOUNT â€” NOW LIVE! Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 22.00 â†’ HK$Â 8.00 [å…è²» ~ HK$Â 38.00]ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether youâ€™re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batterâ€™s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! Collectible Doodle Characters: Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments. Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun: Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action! Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound: Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure. Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 22.00 â†’ HK$Â 8.00 [HK$Â 2.00 ~ HK$Â 22.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 8.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Organize your recipes. Create grocery lists. Plan your meals. Download recipes from your favorite websites. Seamlessly sync to all your devices. Features â€¢ Recipes - Download recipes from your favorite websites, or add your own. â€¢ Grocery Lists - Create smart grocery lists that automatically combine ingredients and sort them by aisle. â€¢ Pantry - Use the pantry to keep track of which ingredients you have and when they expire. â€¢ Meal Planner - Plan your meals using our daily, weekly, or monthly calendars. â€¢ Menus - Save your favorite meal plans as reusable menus. â€¢ Sync - Keep your recipes, grocery lists, and meal plans synced between all your devices. â€¢ Adjust - Scale ingredients to your desired serving size, and convert between measurements. â€¢ Cook - Keep the screen on while cooking, cross off ingredients, and highlight your current step. â€¢ Search - Organize your recipes into categories and subcategories. Search by name, ingredient, and more. â€¢ Timers - Cook times are automatically detected in your directions. Simply tap on one to start a timer. â€¢ Import - Import from existing apps such as MacGourmet, YummySoup!, MasterCook & Living Cookbook. â€¢ Export - Export your meal plans to Calendar and your grocery lists to Reminders. â€¢ Share - Share recipes via AirDrop or email. â€¢ Print - Print recipes, grocery lists, menus, and meal plans. Recipes support multiple print formats including index cards. â€¢ Extensions - Save recipes directly in Safari and view today's scheduled meals. â€¢ Bookmarklet - Download recipes from any browser straight into your Paprika Cloud Sync account. â€¢ Offline Access - All of your data is stored locally. No internet connection is required to view your recipes. What's New in 3.0 â€¢ iPhone X and iOS 11 support. â€¢ iOS app is now universal. â€¢ Multitasking support on iPad. â€¢ Add multiple, full-sized photos to each recipe. Embed photos in your directions. â€¢ Insert links to other recipes or websites in your ingredients or directions. â€¢ Format recipes using bold and italics. â€¢ Convert ingredient measurements between standard and metric. â€¢ Search for recipes across multiple categories. â€¢ Add custom aisles to your grocery list and re-arrange them in your preferred order. â€¢ Create multiple grocery lists. â€¢ Add custom ingredients to the pantry. Track quantities, purchase dates, and expiration dates. â€¢ Move items back and forth between the pantry and grocery list. â€¢ Add custom meal types to the meal planner. â€¢ Create reusable menus that span multiple days. Platforms Paprika is available on multiple platforms so you can access it on all of your devices. Please note that each version is sold separately.
